movie.title: The Death of Stalin
movie.plot: When tyrannical dictator Josef Stalin dies in 1953, his parasitic cronies square off in a frantic power struggle to become the next Soviet leader. Among the contenders are the dweebish Georgy Malenkov, the wily Nikita Khrushchev and Lavrenti Beria, the sadistic secret police chief.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 18 wins & 35 nominations.
